description:
A mysterious girl who loves reading books. She is actually a Faunus and use to be part of the White Fang. She is an introvert and doesnâ€™t say much. Eventually she starts to open-up after being with her teammates.
Her weapon Gambol Shroud transforms between a large broadsword with sheath and two gun-swords. Her Semblance Shadow allows her to create wispy duplicates of herself.
Source: Official site
name: Blake Belladonna
